Source.Name: libnetfilter-queue
Source.Summary: libnetfilter_queue is a userspace library providing an API to packets that have been queued by the kernel packet filter.
Source.Description: libnetfilter_queue is a userspace library providing an API to packets that have been queued by the kernel packet filter. It is is part of a system that deprecates the old ip_queue / libipq mechanism. libnetfilter_queue has been previously known as libnfnetlink_queue.

Package.Name: libnetfilter-queue
